statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -15 \\ 1 \\ 7 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 63 \\ 8 \\ -26 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -2 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
